tools.title: Merge PDF
tools.description: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.

tools.title: Split PDF
tools.description: Separate one page or a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files.

tools.title: Compress PDF
tools.description: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.

tools.title: PDF to WORD
tools.description: Easily convert your PDF files into easy to edit DOC and DOCX documents. The converted WORD document is almost 100% accurate.

tools.title: PDF to POWERPOINT
tools.description: Turn your PDF files into easy to edit PPT and PPTX slideshows.

tools.title: PDF to EXCEL
tools.description: Pull data straight from PDFs into Excel spreadsheets in a few short seconds.

tools.title: WORD to PDF
tools.description: Make DOC and DOCX files easy to read by converting them to PDF.

tools.title: POWERPOINT to PDF
tools.description: Make PPT and PPTX slideshows easy to view by converting them to PDF.

tools.title: EXCEL to PDF
tools.description: Make EXCEL spreadsheets easy to read by converting them to PDF.

tools.title: PDF Edit
tools.description: Add text, images, shapes or freehand annotations to a PDF document. Edit the size, font, and color of the added content.

tools.title: PDF to JPG
tools.description: Convert each PDF page into a JPG or extract all images contained in a PDF.

tools.title: JPG to PDF
tools.description: Convert JPG images to PDF in seconds. Easily adjust orientation and margins.

tools.title: Sign PDF
tools.description: Sign yourself or request electronic signatures from others.

tools.title: Watermark
tools.description: Stamp an image or text over your PDF in seconds. Choose the typography, transparency and position.

tools.title: Rotate PDF
tools.description: Rotate your PDFs the way you need them. You can even rotate multiple PDFs at once!

tools.title: HTML to PDF
tools.description: Convert webpages in HTML to PDF. Copy and paste the URL of the page you want and convert it to PDF with a click.

tools.title: Unlock PDF
tools.description: Remove PDF password security, giving you the freedom to use your PDFs as you want.

tools.title: Protect PDF
tools.description: Protect PDF files with a password. Encrypt PDF documents to prevent unauthorized access.

tools.title: Organize PDF
tools.description: Sort pages of your PDF file however you like. Delete PDF pages or add PDF pages to your document at your convenience.

tools.title: PDF to PDF/A
tools.description: Transform your PDF to PDF/A, the ISO-standardized version of PDF for long-term archiving. Your PDF will preserve formatting when accessed in the future.

tools.title: Repair PDF
tools.description: Repair a damaged PDF and recover data from corrupt PDF. Fix PDF files with our Repair tool.

tools.title: PDF numbers
tools.description: Add page numbers into PDFs with ease. Choose your positions, dimensions, typography.

tools.title: Scan to PDF
tools.description: Capture document scans from your mobile device and send them instantly to your browser.

tools.title: OCR PDF
tools.description: Easily convert scanned PDF into searchable and selectable documents.
